channel.title: PeR on Latvian songs ABC notation
channel.description: Recent content in PeR on Latvian songs ABC notation

item.title: Līdzsvarā
item.description: Vienmēr par daudz, Vienmēr par maz Manās debesīs zvaigznes iekārtas Kaut pavirši spīd Vai staro ik rīt Tās nespēj pat sasildīt Piedziedājums 2 Bet, kad esi klāt, tad viss ir līdzsvarā Tikai divi mēs būsim virs pasaules Pants 2 Vienmēr tik vēss, Vienmēr tik karsts Pat saulē es kaut kas neparasts Kaut pavirši spīd Vai staro ik rīt Tā nespēj pat sasildīt Piedziedājums 2 Bet, kad esi klāt, tad viss ir līdzsvarā Tikai divi mēs būsim virs pasaules Piedziedājums 2x Bet, kad esi klāt, tad viss ir līdzsvarā Tikai divi mēs būsim virs pasaulēs O-o-o, e-e-e, o-o-o-o-o-o-o Piedziedājums 3x Bet, kad esi klāt, tad viss ir līdzsvarā Tikai divi mēs būsim virs pasaules

item.title: Dancing Knights
item.description: Verse: We dance, we dance, we dance We move ourselves, we move ourselves Down the blues, down the blues, down the blues And then they fall, they fall, they fall Our naked bodies, our naked bodies These final moves, dancing moves, dancing moves Chorus: Cause we were chasing all the guiding lights, We were chasing all the guiding lights See it in my eyes, my eyes, my eyes That we were chasing all the guiding lights So when we're falling you could feel the sky When we're falling you could feel the sky Tonight, all night, all night When we're falling you-you could feel the sky Verse: We dance, we dance, we dance We move ourselves, we move ourselves Down the blues, down the blues, down the blues Chorus: Cause we were chasing all the guiding lights, We were chasing all the guiding lights You can see it in my eyes, my eyes, my eyes Cause we were chasing all guiding lights Bridge 2x: You got me now (I'm with you) These shining stars (they take us) Far away now (like knights we) Follow the lights the lights we follow Chorus: Cause we were chasing all the guiding lights, We were chasing all the guiding lights See it in my eyes, my eyes, my eyes That we were chasing all the guiding lights So when we're falling you could feel the sky When we're falling you could feel the sky Tonight, all night, all night When we're falling you could feel the sky

item.title: Disco Superfly
item.description: Across all seas and nations There’s a superfly kickin it wild All the way from grandpa’s basement He’s that old school kinda guy Danger, funky feeling Mister Superfly is in your town Your lady’s psyched out, she’s screamin’ She can’t hold it to his stinky sound You’re saying disco, disco, disco Disco superfly Disco, disco, disco Disco superfly Disco superfly Disco superfly Got no mother, got no lover Superfly going undercover Got no mother, got no lover Superfly going undercover He’s moving like a king, he’s amazing Lights groovin’ with the vibe of the cool Buzzing down, you know super crazy Has the ability to rock your shoes Disco, disco, disco Disco superfly Disco, disco, disco Disco superfly Disco superfly Disco superfly Disco superfly Disco superfly Got no mother, got no lover Superfly going undercover Got no mother, got no lover Superfly going undercover Disco superfly Disco superfly Disco superfly Disco superfly

item.title: Like a Mouse
item.description: We’ll meet each other next summer ’cause it was so cold this winter We’ll have a chance to start, to fall apart again and again Again and again and again and again and again and again You look like a girlfriend right from the backyard I’m just a stupid boy from next door Please never release me from that house I’m gonna be nice and quiet, quiet like a mouse Don’t ever believe me ’cause I’m a child Don’t even try to feed me But you, you can delete me from your house Even if it hurts me again and again, and again You look like a girlfriend right from the backyard I’m just a stupid boy from next door Please never release me from that house I’m gonna be nice and quiet, quiet like a mouse We have never started the love That always comes from backyard But we always knew the meaning of true love You look like a girlfriend right from the backyard I’m just a stupid boy from next door Please never release me from that house I’m gonna be nice and quiet, quiet like a mouse

item.title: Here We Go
item.description: Here we [C] go, here we [F] go So alive, in the sky, we can [C] Fly Here we [C] go, here we [F] go So alive, in the sky, we can [C] Fly Ladies and Gentlemen, I need a starlight 'Cause I never had a day without a fight I slid through the darkness, it took me to a height Of a lonesome, cold and never ending night I'm the man on the moon, call me Andy Kaufman There are demons inside me but I'm stomp'em I know I can be an unstoppable force I try, me, let me take a walk on the bright side Here we [C] go, here we [F] go So alive, in the sky, we can [C] Fly Here we [C] go, here we [F] go So alive, in the sky, we can [C] Fly A lot of thoughts in my head keep pulling me down So many guests in my house I could not notice the sound Of the doorbell telling they're about to come I'm surrounded by problems, I got to run (But no) I keep pulling myself up (But no) I keep pulling myself up I'm on a mission to fulfill my vision All day, everyday, never ever, ever give up Here we [C] go, here we [F] go So alive, in the sky, we can [C] Fly Here we [C] go, here we [F] go So alive, in the sky, we can [C] Fly Here we [C] go, here we [F] go Here we [C] go, here we [F] go So alive, in the sky, we can [C] Fly

item.title: Jauns sākums
item.description: A E Dm Am Dm F Pants: Am Ja mēs, ja mēs, ja mēs Em Dm Ja spētu doties, ja spētu doties Am G Debesīs, debesīs, debesīs Am Un ik rīt, ik rīt, ik rīt Em Dm No jauna mosties, no jauna mosties Am D Uz zemes šīs, zemes šīs, zemes šīs Piedz: Am Mums ļautu savu ceļu aplūkot, Em No malas savu ceļu aplūkot Dm Vienīgo – tik to, tik to Am G Savu dzīves ceļu aplūkot, Tad lejā nākt un sapņus īstenot, Mēs lejā nāktu sapņus īstenot Un gaismu dot un dot, un dot Mēs lejā nāktu to gaismu dot Pants: Ja mēs, ja mēs, ja mēs Ja spētu doties, ja spētu doties Debesīs, debesīs, debesīs Piedz: Mums ļautu savu ceļu aplūkot No malas savu ceļu aplūkot Vienīgo – tik to, tik to No malas savu – to vienīgo Bridge 2x: Ja spētu mēs, Ja spētu mēs, (tad dotos) Ja spētu mēs, (tad dotos) Ja spētu mēs, Ja spētu mēs Piedz: Mums ļautu savu ceļu aplūkot No malas savu ceļu aplūkot Vienīgo – tik to, tik to Savu dzīves ceļu aplūkot, Tad lejā nākt un sapņus īstenot, Mēs lejā nāktu sapņus īstenot Un gaismu dot un dot, un dot Mēs lejā nāktu to, to, to gaismu dot

item.title: Bums
item.description: [E] Es tevi mīlu gribu un jūtu [A] skaistu un jauku simpātisku [E] tūkstoš reiz tevi noskūpstītu [A] bet tik un tā man nepietiktu [E] kā mīlu es [A] kā gribu es [E] neviltotu mīlestību no [A] tevis es [E] septiņām jūrām pāri es skrietu [A] ielu dziedātu smietu un kliegtu [E] nenokristu un nepiekustu [A] varbūt tad arī varbūt tu justu [E] kā mīlu es [A] kā gribu es [E] neviltotu mīlestību no [A] tevis es [B] un pie tavām durvīm es iešu [A] un pastiepšu roku uz priekšu [B] un klusi pieklauvēšu [A] BUM BUM BUM [E] la la la la la la la [A] la la la la la la la
